description: As you enter the dungeon, you are confused by a torrent of light and shadow. Light seems to reflect off the walls unnaturally, and every surface is a mix of blinding light, pitch black, and muddled grey.

Shadow.name: Shadow
Shadow.onDeath: addToDungeonValue numShadowsKilled 1;print "You feel a barrier weakening."

rooms.name: Entryway
rooms.description: The passage leading onwards is framed by a statue of the sun on the left, and a shapeless shadow on the right.
rooms.tutorial: Some things in the Darklight Dungeon can only be seen in the dark. Try using "douse" to darken the room.

onLightingChange.PITCH_BLACK: createPassage EAST 2;print "A passage appears in the darkness."

obstacles.name: Barrel
obstacles.onSmash: createMonster Skeleton;print "A skeleton rises up out of the debris."

rooms.name: Shadowy Crossway
rooms.description: One corner is completely obscured by shadow.

onSearch.corner: createMonster Shadow;startFight;print "A living shadow leaps out and attacks!"

rooms.name: Shadowy Storage
rooms.description: You can't initially make out much in this room.

monsters.name: Shadow Guard
monsters.description: A dangerous shadow stands silently in the middle of the room, blocking your way.
monsters.onDeath: addToDungeonValue numShadowsKilled 1;print "You feel a barrier weakening."

rooms.name: Dim Closet
rooms.description: There is a small table in this tiny room. Nothing else is visible.

rooms.name: Dim Passage
rooms.description: We hope you don't take a dim view of riddles.

obstacles.name: Mystic Barrier
obstacles.riddle: We can only live where there is light, but we die if light shines on us.

rooms.name: Shadowy Armory
rooms.description: This room appears to be completely empty.

contents.name: Helm of Defense
contents.onPickup: createMonster Shadow;print "A great wind surges out of the chest as you pick up the Helm."

rooms.name: Upper Floor Access
rooms.description: Stairs lead up into blindingly bright light.

rooms.name: 2nd Floor Landing
rooms.description: Bright light comes from no apparent source, reflecting off white tiles.

rooms.name: Light Lieutenant's Office
rooms.description: A shining figure stands in the middle of the room.

specialRoomActions.climb: removeTrigger specialRoomActions climb;removeTrigger onSearch ladder;addFeature Mirror;print "You found a mirror up near the ceiling."

onSearch.ladder: removeTrigger specialRoomActions climb;addFeature Mirror;print "You found a mirror up near the ceiling."

monsters.name: Light Lieutenant
monsters.onDeath: changeRoomDescription "There's a light crystal in the room"

contents.name: Mirror Shield
contents.onPickup: print "The way out is barred by a gate controlled by the Light Crystal.";tutorial "You'll need to clean all the mirrors in the room and then use shine."

features.name: Light Crystal
features.description: A dim crystal sits in the middle of the room.

features.name: Small Ladder
features.description: A small ladder allows you to climb up closer to the ceiling.

obstacles.name: Shadowy Barrier
obstacles.onAttempt: tutorial "You have to find and clean all three mirrors first."
obstacles.onClear: print "The barrier is scoured away by the reflected light."

features.name: Big Switch
features.description: A big switch. Try flicking it.

obstacles.name: Shine Puzzle
obstacles.onAttempt: tutorial "You have to find and clean all three mirrors first."

obstacles.name: Barrel
obstacles.onSmash: addFeature Mirror;print "Smashing the barrel reveals a mirror hidden behind it."

rooms.name: Shadow Restoration Room
rooms.description: It's not quite pitch black in here.

monsters.name: Massive Shadow
monsters.onDeath: createMonster MiniShadow;createMonster MiniShadow;print "The massive shadow splits in two!"

rooms.name: Shadow Training
rooms.description: There's a large pool of shadow in the middle of the room.
